name: Wild Fires in the Eastern Kingdoms
tooltip:
Wild Fires in the Eastern Kingdoms

Visit the Fire Festival camps located in Blasted Lands, Eastern Plaguelands, the Hinterlands and Searing Gorge, then speak with the Festival Flamekeeper.

Requirements:
- Flame of the Blasted Lands
- Flame of the Plaguelands
- Flame of the Hinterlands
- Flame of Searing Gorge
